
### C and cache misses (warmup 3)  {.smaller}


```
int array[8];
...
int even_sum = 0, odd_sum = 0;
even_sum += array[0];
odd_sum += array[1];
even_sum += array[2];
odd_sum += array[3];
even_sum += array[4];
odd_sum += array[5];
even_sum += array[6];
odd_sum += array[7];

```
 

* [Assume everything but <code>array</code> is kept in registers (and the compiler does not do anything funny), and array[0] at beginning of cache block.]{.my-small}
* How many data cache misses on a <em>2</em>-set direct-mapped cache with 8B blocks?
